titles.title: Promoting Affordable Housing Near Transit Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, with respect to property disposition for affordable housing, and for other purposes.
Promoting Affordable Housing Near Transit Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Promoting Affordable Housing Near Transit Act
This bill authorizes recipients of certain federal transit assistance to transfer property that is no longer needed to local governments, nonprofits, or other third parties for transit-oriented development projects that support affordable housing and meet other specified criteria.
